snippet: Adrian Rodriguez was accused of stealing thousands of cartridges of copy machine toner from a law firm’s office in Manhattan and selling them on the black market.
abstract: Adrian Rodriguez, low-level office worker at law firm, is accused of stealing thousands of cartridges of copy machine toner from Manhattan office and selling them on black market.
lead_paragraph: Adrian Rodriguez was accused of stealing thousands of cartridges of copy machine toner from a law firm’s office in Manhattan and selling them on the black market.

headline.seo: Man Charged in Theft of Copy Toner Worth Over $376,000
headline.main: For a Thief in This Office, Paper Clips Wouldn’t Do
headline.print_headline: For a Thief In This Office, Paper Clips Wouldn’t Do
